title: MFM Minisode 20
description: We're not here to talk about microphones, we're here to talk about your hometown murders! On this week's My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia continue the tour theme and read your hometown murders from Boston and New York City.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
